title: Touching Wood Pt. I with Angelo Urrutia
description:
Greetings to all the fellow jawnz enthusiasts out there, this one is for the heads! We’re on a real if you know you know type beat this week as Jimmy and Larry are joined by the former engineer of garments at Engineered Garments and current founder and designer of 4S Designs, Angelo Urrutia. The boys and your favorite designer’s favorite designer are going in on an unironic love and respect for Chrome Hearts, bequeathing jawnz to your own mother, shirts that are actually, wait for it, seven shirts, a love of flair and accoutrement, gettin’ that bouclé bussin’, the return of Ralph Lauren, accidental merch, bringing sexy back to menswear, bantering with the boys, sneakerhead amnesia, the flyest strip mall in America, scoring raw, uncut vintage and much more on this episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
